EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

calculateTradeFees(uint256).details: Calculate trade fees for a given price

cancelNFTSale(address,uint256).details: Cancel NFT sale and unlock customization

params.tokenId: Token ID to cancel sale for

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw all funds to treasury

getSaleInfo(address,uint256).details: Get sale information for an NFT

getTradingStats(address).details: Get trading statistics for a user

isCustomizationLocked(address,uint256).details: Check if NFT customization is locked

lockCustomization(address,uint256).details: Lock NFT customization (called by customization contract)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

prepareNFTForTrade(address,uint256,uint2.details: Prepare NFT for trading with customization lock options

params.allowCustomization: Whether to allow customization during sale period
params.salePrice: Price at which to list the NFT
params.tokenId: Token ID to prepare for trading

accessControl.details: Reference to the access control contract

authorizedNFTContracts.details: Mapping to track authorized NFT contracts

customizationLocked.details: Mapping to track NFT customization locks during trades
